fig.basic
Class ClassInitializer

java.lang.Object
  fig.basic.ClassInitializer

public class ClassInitializer
extends Object

This utility class allows for initialization of all Java(tm) classes at startup to avoid initialization delays at an innapropriate time.

Initialization logs are available through LogContext. For example:[code] public static main(String[] args) { LogContext.enter(LogContext.NULL); // Temporarely disables logging errors and warnings. try { ClassInitializer.initializeAll(); // Initializes bootstrap, extensions and classpath classes. } finally { LogContext.exit(LogContext.NULL); } ... }[/code]

Version:
3.6, November 6, 2005
Author:
Jean-Marie Dautelle
